Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1750 WEST 75TH AVENUE,SUITE 101, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6P 6G2, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Westport Fuel Systems Inc is a provider of high-performance, low-emission engine and fuel system technologies utilizing gaseous fuels. The company segment includes Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM), Independent Aftermarket (IAM), and Corporate. It generates maximum revenue from the OEM segment.
